citations.narrative:
A current record of guinea pigs on hand was not available for review during this inspection. A total of 522 adult
guinea pigs and weanlings were counted during this inspection. There were no inventory records indicating the
number of adults, weanlings, or newborns present for the last few months. Records need to be kept on births and
deaths to help keep track of animals and for evaluating the facility animal care program. Correct by ensuring that
records are kept on births and deaths. Correct by April 13, 2019.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)
RECORDS: DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS.
A current record of guinea pigs on hand was not available for review during this inspection. A total of 522 adult
guinea pigs and weanlings were counted during this inspection. There were no inventory records indicating the
number of adults, weanlings, or newborns present for the last few months. Records need to be kept on births and
deaths to help keep track of animals and for evaluating the facility animal care program. Correct by ensuring that
records are kept on births and deaths.  Correct by April 13, 2019.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
